sentences.sContent: A win is always good for morale.
sentences.sCn: 胜利总是可以鼓舞士气。

sentences.sContent: The failed coup caused a loss of morale within the army.
sentences.sCn: 政变未遂挫伤了军队的士气。

sentences.sContent: the Prince’s morale-boosting (= intended to raise morale ) mission to the war﹣torn country
sentences.sCn: 王子去这个饱受战争磨难的国家鼓舞士气的使命

trans.tranOther: the level of confidence and positive feelings that people have, especially people who work together, who belong to the same team etc
